name: Shoot The Octopus
description:
Shoot The Octopus it's just an arcade game of shooting space octopus, where you have to recharge your own bullets. While you're killing octopus, the difficulty will be increasing. Try not to die, and reach the best score.

This project is only a prototype to learn Unity. No updates are planned for now. If you're using Brave Browser, disable the Brave shields.

Controls:

  • WASD / Directional keys: Move
  • E / Space: Shoot
  • R / C: Recharge

How to play:

Your objective is score your best without dying. You have a limit of 5 bullets, so you have to be recharging them for not run out of it.
